description: Continuation of structural notes containing structural observation designation form (City of Long Beach), special inspection requirements table, special inspection required section, structural steel specifications, comprehensive structural abbreviations table, and declaration/design assumptions statement. Includes APPROVED stamp.
key_content: Structural Observation Designation form (City of Long Beach, per CBC 1704.6)
Special Inspection requirements table (concrete, reinforcing steel, wood framing, soil/foundation, bolts/anchors)
Special Inspection Required section with conditions triggering special inspection
Structural Steel specifications (ASTM standards, welding, connections)
Structural Abbreviations table (~60+ entries: DFL, HDU, LVL, TJI, GWB, O.C., PSI, PSF, STR, etc.)
Declaration and Design Assumptions Statement with engineer signature
City of Long Beach Development Services regulatory compliance forms
APPROVED by Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check
Structural engineer: Jose Ramirez, PE — Project No. 61-097
